DOC.detailed_description: Patients admit consecutively potentially eligible study witness out-off hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) apparently related heart disease interval < 60 minute collapse return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) . Additional inclusion criterion : 1 . Age > 18 year . 2 . Initial register rhythm shockable rhythm ( ventricular fibrillation pulseless ventricular tachycardia ) asystole . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Known pregnancy 2 . Glasgow Coma Scale score ROSC > 8 . 3 . Cardiogenic shock ( systolic blood pressure < 80 mm Hg despite inotrope infusion > 30 minute ) . 4 . Other nonshockable rhythm ( pulseless electric activity ) . 5 . Terminal illness present OHCA . 6 . Possible cause coma cardiac arrest ( drug overdose , head trauma , cerebrovascular accident ) .
